text: Aur Allah Taalaa ki yaad unn ginti kay chand dinon (ayyaam-e-tashreeq) mein kero do din ki jaldi kerney walay per bhi koi gunah nahi aur jo peechay reh jaye uss per bhi koi gunah nahi yeh perhezgar kay liye hai aur Allah Taalaa say dartay raho aur jaan rakho kay tum sab ussi ki taraf jama kiye jao gay
